title: Support CONIME and VAR-LENGTH CJK CHARS in Other than 936/950/932/949
body:
In earlier versions of Windows, none of CJK FONTS, VAR-LENGTH CJK CHARS, or CONIME is supported in non-CJK .
Now in 14332 and later, CJK FONTS support has added, but still dropped out VAR-LENGTH CJK CHARS and CONIME.
